title: Improve multi language support
body: There are new ideas introduced in WPF with x:Uid in XAML and locbaml command line tool but the translation process is a mess, see http://wpflocalization.codeplex.com/

comments.body: I cast 100 votes for this. Localization and Multi-Language support should be easier in WPF that it was with WinForms. This topic is so underrated and needs to be a top priority to the WPF team. It's so serious that it has become the main reason why we abandoned WPF for our projects, at least for us.
WPF should support the same localization tools like Windows Store apps
